text.2204: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare nasamanantare naa~n~nama~n~ne  naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate ^a^M2.0287^ea^ sattarasa, naaasevane  sattarasa, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa  pa~nca, novigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2207: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0327^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m...pe0...  avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2215: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ sekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa   ^a^T2.0380^ea^ -- sekkha.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.2216: [03] asekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- asekkha.m eka.m khandha.m  sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.2217: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  nevasekkhanaasekkha.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.2219: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ sekkha.m ^a^M2.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0328^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sekkho dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa...  adhipatipaccayaa...pe0... purejaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa (dve kaatabbaa)...pe0...  avigatapaccayaa.
text.2221: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare samanantare sahajaate  a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate tii.ni, aasevane dve, kamme tii.ni...pe0...  avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2225: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m nevasekkhanaasekkha.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.2227: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ sekkha.m ^a^V2.0329^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa   ^a^T2.0381^ea^ -- sekkhe khandhe sa.msa.t.tho sekkho adhipati. (1)
text.2228: [01] asekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- asekkhe khandhe  sa.msa.t.tho asekkho adhipati. (1)
text.2229: [01] nevasekkhanaasekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa  (paripu.n.na.m, eka.m).
text.2231: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ sekkha.m ^a^M2.0289^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sekkho dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa...  napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa... nakammapaccayaa (dve kaatabbaa)... navipaakapaccayaa  (dve kaatabbaa)... najhaanapaccayaa... namaggapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa...pe0....
text.2233: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane  tii.ni, nakamme dve, navipaake dve, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni  (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2236: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate naaasevane tii.ni,  nakamme dve, navipaake dve, navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2239: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0330^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare samanantare   sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye  purejaate aasevane kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte  atthiyaa ^a^T2.0382^ea^ natthiyaa vigate avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2247: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^M2.0290^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2248: [03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2249: [03] sekkho ^a^V2.0331^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2251: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.2253: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa  vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkha.m phala.m paccavekkhanti, cetopariya~naa.nena sekkhacittasama"ngissa  ^a^T2.0383^ea^ citta.m jaananti, sekkhaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2254: [03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa asekkha.m  phala.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.nena asekkhacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, asekkhaa  khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2255: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0291^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe  suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti.  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa pahiine  kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne  kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti,  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m nevasekkhanaasekkhe  ^a^V2.0332^ea^ khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati,  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena  nevasekkhanaasekkhacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T2.0384^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2256: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa,  sekkhassa phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2257: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m asekkhassa  phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2259: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2260: [03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhanti, sekkha.m phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti ^a^M2.0292^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  sekkhaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2261: [03] sekkho ^a^T2.0385^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  sekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.2262: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ asekkho ^a^V2.0333^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa   adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  asekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2263: [03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa asekkha.m phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- asekkhaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.2264: [03] asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- asekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2265: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^T2.0386^ea^ jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa nibbaana.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m nevasekkhanaasekkhe khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  nevasekkhanaasekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.2266: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  nibbaana.m maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2267: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0293^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  nibbaana.m asekkhassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2269: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^V2.0334^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa   anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sekkhaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. maggo sekkhassa  phalassa... sekkha.m phala.m sekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2270: [03] sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- maggo asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.2271: [03] sekkho ^a^T2.0387^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- sekkha.m phala.m vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2272: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  asekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. asekkha.m  phala.m asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2273: [03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- asekkha.m phala.m vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2274: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m  khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... aavajjanaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2275: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa...  vodaana.m maggassa... anuloma.m sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusala.m  sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2276: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ^a^V2.0335^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- anuloma.m  asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa ^a^T2.0388^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriya.m asekkhaaya  phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2278: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (anantarasadisa.m,  a.t.tha pa~nhaa).
text.2280: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (pa.ticcavaare sahajaatasadisa.m,  nava pa~nhaa) a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaare a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m, tii.ni. nissayapaccaye  kusalattike nissayapaccayasadisa.m, terasa pa~nhaa).
text.2282: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. dutiyo  maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. maggo sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2283: [03] sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- maggo asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.2284: [03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccaya -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa  magga.m ^a^V2.0336^ea^ upanissaaya anuppanna.m kusalasamaapatti.m ^a^T2.0389^ea^ uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare  aniccato...pe0... vipassanti, maggo ariyaana.m atthappa.tisambhidaaya...pe0... pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaaya...  .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa ^a^M2.0295^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa phalasamaapattiyaa  kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2285: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ --  purimaa purimaa asekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0...  asekkha.m phala.m asekkhassa phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2286: [03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- asekkhaa  phalasamaapatti kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2287: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo --  nevasekkhanaasekkha.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti. siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0...  jhaana.m...pe0... vipassana.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m  jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. nevasekkhanaasekkha.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0...  patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya  daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m  bhindati. nevasekkhanaasekkhaa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m  sukha.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0390^ea^ senaasana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0...  patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamassa  jhaanassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa jhaanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  parikamma.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.2288: [03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V2.0337^ea^, ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.   pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa  maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... catutthassa maggassa  parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.2558: [03] appamaa.na.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho appamaa.no dhammo uppajjati naaasevanapaccayaa -- vipaaka.m appamaa.na.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2560: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ paritta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho paritto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- paritte khandhe  sa.msa.t.thaa parittaa cetanaa. (1)
text.2561: [03] mahaggata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- mahaggate khandhe sa.msa.t.thaa  mahaggataa cetanaa. (1)
text.2562: [03] appamaa.na.m ^a^V2.0370^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho appamaa.no dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- kusale appamaa.ne  khandhe sa.msa.t.thaa appamaa.naa cetanaa. (1)
text.2564: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ paritta.m ^a^M2.0322^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho paritto dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa --  paritta.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2565: [03] mahaggata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa -- mahaggata.m eka.m khandha.m  sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2566: [03] appamaa.na.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho appamaa.no dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa -- kusala.m appamaa.na.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2568: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ paritta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho paritto dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa... namaggapaccayaa...  navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe paritta.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2569: [03] mahaggata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe mahaggata.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2570: [03] appamaa.na.m ^a^T2.0425^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho appamaa.no dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe appamaa.na.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.2573: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V2.0371^ea^ eka.m, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni,   napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane  tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni  (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2576: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake  navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.natabba.m).
text.2579: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M2.0323^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate  eka (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2587: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- parittaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.2588: [03] mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (pavattipa.tisandhi kaatabbaa).
text.2589: [03] appamaa.no ^a^T2.0426^ea^ dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.2591: [03] 56^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m... paritte khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m  aarabbha raago uppajjati ^a^V2.0373^ea^ ...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2592: [03] paritto ^a^M2.0324^ea^ dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- dibbena cakkhunaa  ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena parittacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati. parittaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2593: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena  mahaggatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0427^ea^. mahaggataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2594: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- pa.thama.m jhaana.m paccavekkhati...pe0...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m  paccavekkhati, iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m  paccavekkhati, yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, anaagata.msa~naa.na.m paccavekkhati.  mahaggate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vippassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)
text.2595: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa,  phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2596: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2597: [03] appamaa.no ^a^V2.0374^ea^ dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa cetopariya~naa.nena  appamaa.nacittasama"ngissa ^a^T2.0428^ea^ citta.m jaananti, appamaa.naa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2599: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ paritto ^a^M2.0325^ea^ dhammo parittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti.  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... paritte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- parittaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2600: [03] mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- mahaggataadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2601: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- pa.thama.m jhaana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m...pe0...  dibba.m cakkhu.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. mahaggate khandhe  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati... di.t.thi   ^a^T2.0429^ea^ uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- mahaggataadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.2602: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  mahaggataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.2603: [03] 60^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no ^a^V2.0375^ea^ dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa... phalassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appamaa.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.2604: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa,  vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo ^a^M2.0326^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appamaa.naadhipati  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2605: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa ca appamaa.nassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  appamaa.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena   ^a^T2.0430^ea^ paccayo.  (3)
text.2607: [03] 61^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa parittaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m parittaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m  gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... aavajjanaa parittaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.2608: [03] paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- paritta.m cuticitta.m mahaggatassa  upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. parittaa khandhaa mahaggatassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m...pe0...  dibbassa cakkhussa parikamma.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.nassa parikamma.m anaagata.msa~naa.nassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2609: [03] paritto ^a^V2.0376^ea^ dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m  maggassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2610: [03] 62^b^.^eb^ mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  mahaggataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m mahaggataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2611: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0431^ea^ -- mahaggata.m cuticitta.m parittassa  upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. mahaggata.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya anantarapaccayena  paccayo. mahaggataa khandhaa parittassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2612: [03] mahaggato ^a^M2.0327^ea^ dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2613: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  appamaa.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m appamaa.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2614: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- phala.m parittassa vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2615: [03] appamaa.no dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- phala.m mahaggatassa vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2618: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ paritto ^a^V2.0377^ea^ dhammo parittassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- paritto eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa, vatthu khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo; eka.m   ^a^T2.0432^ea^ mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... (1)
text.2619: [03] paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu mahaggataana.m  khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2620: [03] 65^b^.^eb^ mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- mahaggato eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.2621: [03] mahaggato ^a^M2.0328^ea^ dhammo parittassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- mahaggataa khandhaa  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne mahaggataa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2622: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- mahaggato  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.2623: [03] 66^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- appamaa.no eko  khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0.... (1)
text.2624: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- appamaa.naa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2625: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa ca appamaa.nassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- appamaa.no  ^a^V2.0378^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0....  (3)
text.2626: [03] 67^b^.^eb^ paritto ca appamaa.no ca dhammaa parittassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- appamaa.naa  khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena ^a^T2.0433^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.2627: [03] paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammaa parittassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- mahaggataa khandhaa  ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne mahaggataa  khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. text.2630: [03] 68^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- paritto eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa  vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0...  asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... text.2631: [03] paritto ^a^M2.0329^ea^ dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne  vatthu mahaggataana.m khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0.... (2)
text.2632: [03] mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- mahaggato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.2633: [03] mahaggato ^a^V2.0379^ea^ dhammo parittassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne   ^a^T2.0434^ea^ mahaggataa khandhaa vatthussa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2634: [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne  mahaggato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m vatthussa ca a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0....  (3)

text.2638: [03] 69^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- paritto eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu parittaana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.2639: [03] paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- vatthu mahaggataana.m khandhaana.m  nissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu mahaggataana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  (2)

text.2652: [03] 72^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paritta.m  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, vipassana.m  uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, paritta.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m...  raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m  deti, siila.m...pe0... uposatha.m...pe0... vipassana.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0...  sa"ngha.m bhindati. parittaa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m  sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m parittaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya ^a^T2.0437^ea^, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya,  kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kusalaakusala.m  kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paa.naatipaato paa.naatipaatassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo (cakka.m kaatabba.m). maatughaatikamma.m maatughaatikammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo (cakka.m kaatabba.m kusalattikasadisa.m). (1)
text.2653: [03] paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- paritta.m saddha.m upanissaaya mahaggata.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti,  samaapatti.m uppaadeti. paritta.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... senaasana.m  upanissaaya mahaggata.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti.  parittaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m mahaggataaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena ^a^V2.0382^ea^  paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. dibbassa cakkhussa parikamma.m...pe0...  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa parikamma.m...pe0.... (2)
text.2654: [03] paritto dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo paritta.m ^a^M2.0332^ea^ saddha.m upanissaaya appamaa.na.m jhaana.m uppaadeti,  magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m uppaadeti. paritta.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m...  raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya appamaa.na.m  jhaana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m uppaadeti. parittaa saddhaa...pe0...  senaasana.m appamaa.naaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. pa.thamassa ^a^T2.0438^ea^ maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m  catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.2655: [03] 73^b^.^eb^ mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- mahaggata.m saddha.m upanissaaya mahaggata.m  jhaana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. mahaggata.m siila.m...pe0...  pa~n~na.m upanissaaya mahaggata.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti.  mahaggataa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa mahaggataaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.2659: [03] appamaa.no dhammo parittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- appamaa.na.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m  deti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m... vipassana.m uppaadeti. appamaa.na.m siila.m...pe0...  pa~n~na.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m... vipassana.m... appamaa.naa  saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa parittaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya...pe0... kaayikassa  sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. phalasamaapatti kaayikassa  sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ariyaa magga.m upanissaaya ^a^T2.0440^ea^ sa"nkhaare aniccato...pe0...  vipassanti, maggo ariyaana.m atthappa.tisambhidaaya...pe0... pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaaya...  .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.2660: [03] appamaa.no dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- appamaa.na.m saddha.m upanissaaya mahaggata.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti,  samaapatti.m uppaadeti, appamaa.na.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya ^a^V2.0384^ea^ mahaggata.m jhaana.m uppaadeti,  abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. appamaa.naa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa mahaggataaya  saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo, ariyaa magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m  samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti. text.2662: [03] 75^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato...pe0... ^a^M2.0334^ea^  vipassati assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...  vatthu parittaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.2693: [03] 83^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- paritto eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena ^a^M2.0338^ea^ paccayo. vatthu  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0....  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, ruupaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  vatthu parittaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- parittaa khandhaa purejaatassa  imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.2946: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T2.0482^ea^ sattarasa, aaramma.ne satta, adhipatiyaa sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare  satta, sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejaate  satta, aasevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipaake eka.m, aahaare sattarasa, indriye sattarasa,  jhaane sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyaa sattarasa,  natthiyaa satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.2950: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ aniyata.m ^a^V2.0424^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m aniyata.m  eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe paccayaa vatthu, vatthu.m paccayaa khandhaa. eka.m  mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m. vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa aniyataa khandhaa. vicikicchaasahagate  uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.2952: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyata.m dhamma.m paccayaa aniyato dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- micchattaniyate  khandhe paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (kusalattikasadisa.m, pa~nca kaatabbaa).

text.3023: [03] sammattaniyato ^a^M2.0372^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni.
text.3024: [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aniyataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.3026: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa micchattaniyate  pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. micchattaniyate  khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassanti. cetopariya~naa.nena micchattaniyatacittasama"ngissa  ^a^V2.0432^ea^ citta.m jaananti. micchattaniyataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3027: [03] sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti. cetopariya~naa.nena sammattaniyatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti.  sammattaniyataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa   ^a^T2.0489^ea^, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3028: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. ariyaa aniyate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese  paccavekkhanti. pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...  aniyate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m  aarabbha aniyato raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m  passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena ^a^M2.0373^ea^ aniyatacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aniyataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3029: [03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa...  pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ^a^T2.0490^ea^ ruhiruppaadakammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  ya.m vatthu.m paraamasantassa micchattaniyataa khandhaa uppajjanti, ta.m vatthu micchattaniyataana.m  khandhaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3030: [03] aniyato ^a^V2.0433^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (3)

text.3038: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena   paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati ^a^V2.0434^ea^ sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0...  ariyaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0...  aniyate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa aniyato raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.3049: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ --  maatughaatikamma.m maatughaatikammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maatughaatikamma.m...pe0...  pitughaatikamma.m...pe0... arahantaghaatikamma.m...pe0... ruhiruppaadakamma.m...pe0...  sa"nghabhedakamma.m...pe0... niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (cakka.m kaatabba.m).  niyatamicchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. niyatamicchaadi.t.thi maatughaatikammassa...pe0...  sa"nghabhedakammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3050: [03] micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- maatara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa  tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. pitara.m  jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... arahanta.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... du.t.thena cittena  tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadetvaa...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m  deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. (2)
text.3051: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ --  pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^M2.0376^ea^ paccayo...pe0... tatiyo  maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3052: [03] sammattaniyato ^a^V2.0436^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena   ^a^T2.0494^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa  magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare  aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. maggo ariyaana.m atthappa.tisambhidaaya...pe0...  .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3053: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... jhaana.m uppaadeti,  vipassana.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati.  aniyata.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m  sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0...  nigamaghaata.m karoti. aniyataa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... senaasana.m  aniyataaya saddhaaya...pe0... kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m tasseva...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  parikamma.m tasseva...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... paa.naatipaato paa.naatipaatassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo  (cakka.m kaatabba.m). (1)
text.3054: [03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m ^a^T2.0495^ea^ raaga.m upanissaaya maatara.m  jiivitaa voropeti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. aniyata.m dosa.m...pe0... patthana.m...  kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti...pe0...  sa"ngha.m bhindati. aniyato raago...pe0... senaasana.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa...  arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa... sa"nghabhedakammassa... niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.3057: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aniyato raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu aniyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.3058: [03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T2.0496^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa...  pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.3098: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0443^ea^ satta, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa a.t.tha, anantare pa~nca, samanantare pa~nca,  sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejaate tii.ni,  pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme satta, vipaake eka.m, aahaare satta, indriye  satta, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte ^a^T2.0503^ea^ tii.ni, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa terasa, natthiyaa  pa~nca, vigate pa~nca, avigate terasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

text.3291: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ maggaaramma.no ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ^a^V2.0467^ea^ dhammo maggaaramma.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaataa...pe0... (naanaakkha.nikaa natthi, sattarasa pa~nhaa kaatabbaa).
text.3293: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ maggaaramma.no dhammo maggaaramma.nassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo...  atthipaccayena paccayo (ime satta paccayaa ^a^T2.0528^ea^ sattarasa pa~nhaa hetusadisaa)... natthipaccayena  paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaa)... avigatapaccayena paccayo (sattarasa  pa~nhaa).
text.3295: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa sattarasa, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa ekaviisa, anantare nava, samanantare nava,  sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekaviisa, aasevane  nava, kamme sattarasa, aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyaa sattarasa,  natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

text.3321: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ekaviisa, naaaramma.ne sattarasa (naaaramma.ne gahite pakataaramma.nampi upanissayaaramma.nampi  dvepi chijjanti), naadhipatiyaa ^a^T2.0531^ea^ ekaviisa, naanantare nasamanantare nasahajaate naa~n~nama~n~ne  nanissaye naupanissaye napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare  naindriye najhaane namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyaa nonatthiyaa novigate noavigate  ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3325: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M2.0404^ea^ naaaramma.ne sattarasa, naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare  naupanissaye napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare naindriye  najhaane namagge navippayutte nonatthiyaa novigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3329: [03] 56^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0471^ea^ aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa ekaviisa, anantare nava, samanantare nava,  sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekaviisa, aasevane  nava, kamme sattarasa, aahaare sattarasa, indriye jhaane magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyaa  sattarasa, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3336: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^T2.0532^ea^ ^a^M2.0405^ea^ ^a^V2.0472^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  uppannaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3338: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- uppanna.m cakkhu.m aniccato  dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  uppanna.m sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase...  pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... uppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V2.0473^ea^ ...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  uppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3339: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anuppanne ruupe...  sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato  vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^T2.0533^ea^ uppajjati. anuppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3340: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- uppaadi.m cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaaya.m... ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... uppaadii khandhe aniccato  dukkhato anattato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. uppaadii khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3342: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0406^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- uppanna.m cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. uppanna.m sota.m...  ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m...  uppanne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati...pe0....  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- uppannaa adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3343: [03] anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- anuppanne  ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anuppanne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.3344: [03] uppaadii ^a^T2.0534^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- uppaadi.m  ^a^V2.0474^ea^ cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... uppaadii khandhe  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. text.3346: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- uppanno eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa  dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppanno  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve  khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m...  utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0...  mahaabhuutaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3348: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0407^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- uppanno  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppanno ^a^T2.0535^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m vatthussa ca a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo. dve khandhaa...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m  a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m...  utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0.... (1)
text.3350: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- uppanno eko khandho  ti.n.nanna.m ^a^V2.0475^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m...pe0... eka.m  mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m  cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3352: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^ pakatuupanissayo -- uppanna.m utu.m upanissaaya jhaana.m  uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m  uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. uppanna.m bhojana.m...pe0... senaasana.m  upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0...  samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. uppanna.m utu... ^a^T2.0536^ea^ bhojana.m...  senaasana.m uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa,  maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3353: [03] anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anuppanna.m ^a^M2.0408^ea^ va.n.nasampada.m  patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. anuppanna.m  saddasampada.m... gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m... anuppanne khandhe patthayamaano  daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. anuppannaa va.n.nasampadaa...pe0...  anuppannaa khandhaa uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.3354: [03] uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- uppaadi.m cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati,  uposathakamma.m karoti. uppaadi.m sotasampada.m...pe0... kaayasampada.m...pe0... va.n.nasampada.m ^a^V2.0476^ea^...  gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m... uppaadii khandhe patthayamaano daana.m deti,  siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. uppaadii cakkhusampadaa...pe0... kaayasampadaa...  va.n.nasampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa... uppaadii khandhaa uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0...  pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa   ^a^T2.0537^ea^ upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. text.3356: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato  anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu uppannaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.3358: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa uppannaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.3362: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^V2.0477^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako uppanno  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T2.0538^ea^ uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa  ca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo. text.3366: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. text.3368: [03] 16^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo...  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  uppannaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa, vatthu khandhaana.m  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^M2.0410^ea^  ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena  ^a^T2.0539^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.3370: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^V2.0478^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0....  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotudhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa  imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3372: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo...pe0....
text.3374: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa eka.m, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne  eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate kamme vipaake  aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa avigate eka.m (eva.m   ^a^T2.0540^ea^ ga.netabba.m).
text.3377: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0411^ea^ ^a^V2.0479^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3378: [03] anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3379: [03] uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3381: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... navippayutte  tii.ni, noatthiyaa dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni, noavigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3384: [03] 22^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne eka.m...pe0... nonatthiyaa novigate eka.m.
text.3387: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0480^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m,  nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m, kamme vipaake  aahaare indriye jhaane ^a^T2.0541^ea^ magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa avigate eka.m.
text.3394: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno ^a^M2.0412^ea^ ^a^V2.0481^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --  paccuppannaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo.  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.3396: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m...pe0... paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti,  phala.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,  pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. atiita.m cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato  vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. atiita.m sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m... jivha.m...  kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... atiite khandhe aniccato  dukkhato anattato ^a^V2.0482^ea^ vipassati ^a^T2.0542^ea^, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. atiitaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3397: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagata.m cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m... anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataa khandhaa  iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3398: [03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- paccuppanna.m cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... paccuppanne ^a^M2.0413^ea^  khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati,  dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... paccuppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3400: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo   ^a^T2.0543^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. atiita.m cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... atiite khandhe garu.m  katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  (1)  anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.   ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- anaagata.m ^a^V2.0483^ea^  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... anaagate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.3401: [03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paccuppanna.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...  paccuppanne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- paccuppannaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3403: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  atiitaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m ^a^T2.0544^ea^ vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa...  maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3405: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ atiito ^a^M2.0414^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m).  (1)
text.3407: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3409: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ atiito ^a^V2.0484^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena   ^a^T2.0545^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- atiita.m  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti,  vipassana.m... magga.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m  ga.nhaati. atiita.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m  sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0...  samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. atiitaa saddhaa...pe0...  pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... paccuppannaaya  saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3410: [03] anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anaagata.m cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano...pe0...  sotasampada.m... ghaanasampada.m jivhaasampada.m... kaayasampada.m... va.n.nasampada.m... saddasampada.m...  gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m...patthayamaano...pe0... anaagate khandhe patthayamaano  daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... anaagataa cakkhusampadaa...pe0...  va.n.nasampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa... anaagataa khandhaa paccuppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0...  pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3411: [03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paccuppanna.m ^a^M2.0415^ea^ utu.m  upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... paccuppanna.m bhojana.m senaasana.m  upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti. paccuppanna.m utu...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m paccuppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya kaayikassa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3413: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno ^a^V2.0485^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  ^a^T2.0546^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3415: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa  paccuppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3417: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  atiitaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo.  anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa  aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3419: [03] 12^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ --  atiitaa cetanaa paccuppannaana.m vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3420: [03] paccuppanno ^a^M2.0416^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- paccuppannaa  cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m ^a^V2.0486^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  paccuppannaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3422: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena   ^a^T2.0547^ea^ paccayo -- vipaako  paccuppano eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3424: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo...  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- paccuppannaa  khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaa  khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,  vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- paccuppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  (1)

text.3435: [03] anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
