text.3444: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne  nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate aasevane eka.m...pe0...  kamme dve, vipaake eka.m (imesu padesu eka.myeva), avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3452: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^T2.0550^ea^ ^a^M2.0419^ea^ ^a^V2.0489^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa.  pa.tisandhikkha.ne atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca  dve khandhaa. (1)
text.3453: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anaagataaramma.na.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. (1)
text.3454: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. (1)
text.3456: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^V2.0490^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa...  adhipatipaccayaa (adhipatiyaa pa.tisandhi natthi)... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa...  sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa...  aasevanapaccayaa (purejaatepi aasevanepi pa.tisandhi natthi)... kammapaccayaa...   ^a^T2.0551^ea^ vipaakapaccayaa  (vipaaka.m atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m, tissopi pa~nhaa paripu.n.naa. pavattipa.tisandhi  kaatabbaa)... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa... sampayuttapaccayaa...  vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa... avigatapaccayaa.
text.3458: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... (sabbattha tii.ni),  vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3462: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^M2.0420^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^V2.0491^ea^ ...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.3463: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m  anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate  uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.3464: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m ^a^T2.0552^ea^ pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.3466: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa  (anulomasahajaatasadisa.m).
text.3468: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa --  aruupe atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.3469: [03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe  anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.3470: [03] paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (1)
text.3472: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^M2.0421^ea^ ^a^V2.0492^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napacchaajaatapaccayaa...  naaasevanapaccayaa (naadhipatisadisaa)... nakammapaccayaa -- atiitaaramma.ne khandhe pa.ticca atiitaaramma.naa  cetanaa. (1)
text.3473: [03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- anaagataaramma.ne  khandhe pa.ticca anaagataaramma.naa ^a^T2.0553^ea^ cetanaa. (1)
text.3474: [03] paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- paccuppannaaramma.ne  khandhe pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.naa cetanaa. (1)
text.3476: [03] 12^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa...pe0...  (navipaake pa.tisandhi natthi).
text.3478: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa --  pa~ncavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (1)
text.3480: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m  atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... (nahetusadisaa tisso pa~nhaa,  moho natthi ).
text.3482: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^V2.0493^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa --  aruupe atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (1)
text.3483: [03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe  anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.3485: [03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M2.0422^ea^ tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane  nakamme navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge tii.ni, navippayutte ^a^T2.0554^ea^ dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3489: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake  tii.ni, navippayutte dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3492: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0494^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... (sabbattha tii.ni) avigate tii.ni (eva.m  ga.netabba.m).
text.3500: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- atiitaaramma.naa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^M2.0423^ea^ paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  atiitaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3501: [03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.naa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3502: [03] paccuppannaaramma.no ^a^T2.0555^ea^ dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- paccuppannaaramma.naa  ^a^V2.0495^ea^ hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaaramma.naa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3504: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- atiita.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m  paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m  paccavekkhati. ariyaa atiitaaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite  kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. atiitaaramma.ne atiite  khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha atiitaaramma.no  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati. atiitaaramma.naa atiitaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3505: [03] atiitaaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m  paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m  paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.ne anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... ^a^T2.0556^ea^ vipassati, assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  atiitaaramma.naa anaagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3506: [03] atiitaaramma.no ^a^M2.0424^ea^ dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  cetopariya~naa.nena atiitaaramma.napaccuppannacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. atiitaaramma.naa  paccuppannaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3507: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.no ^a^V2.0496^ea^ dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.na.m  anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m...pe0...  anaagataaramma.ne anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati;  ta.m aarabbha anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataaramma.naa  anaagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3508: [03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.na.m  atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m...pe0...  ariyaa anaagataaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti.  pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. anaagataaramma.ne atiite khandhe aniccato...pe0...  vipassati ^a^T2.0557^ea^, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataaramma.naa atiitaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3509: [03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena  anaagataaramma.napaccuppannacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. anaagataaramma.naa paccuppannaa  khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

text.3514: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- atiita.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m atiita.m  iddhividha~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0...  yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.ne atiite khandhe garu.m  katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati ^a^T2.0559^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- atiitaaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3515: [03] atiitaaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ^a^M2.0426^ea^  ...pe0... atiitaaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0...  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... atiitaaramma.ne  anaagate khandhe garu.m ^a^V2.0498^ea^ katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa anaagataaramma.no  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)
text.3516: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- anaagataaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m garu.m  katvaa...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  anaagataaramma.ne anaagate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa  anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anaagataaramma.naadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.3528: [03] paccuppannaaramma.no ^a^M2.0428^ea^ ^a^V2.0500^ea^ dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  paccuppannaaramma.na.m pa.tisandhicitta.m atiitaaramma.nassa bhava"ngassa...pe0... paccuppannaaramma.na.m  bhava"nga.m atiitaaramma.nassa bhava"ngassa...pe0... paccuppannaaramma.naa khandhaa atiitaaramma.nassa vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.3679: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0...  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa ^a^T2.0580^ea^ maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m  paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,  pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe...pe0...  pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotudhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. ruupaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  ajjhattaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. text.3684: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m  garu.m katvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... phala.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... ajjhatte khandhe garu.m  katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m ^a^M2.0444^ea^ garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhattaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.3695: [03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- paro ajjhatta.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti,  di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati ^a^T2.0585^ea^. paro ajjhatta.m siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti,  paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. ajjhattaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m bahiddhaa  saddhaaya...pe0... maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.3696: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paro bahiddhaa  saddha.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m ^a^M2.0446^ea^ upanissaaya  daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati bahiddhaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m bahiddhaa saddhaaya...pe0...  phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3697: [03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- bahiddhaa saddha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0...  sa"ngha.m bhindati. bahiddhaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m ajjhattaaya saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3699: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0522^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato  dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m  passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ^a^T2.0586^ea^ kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu ajjhattaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3700: [03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- paro  ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana.m bahiddhaa  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3701: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- paro bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m  bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0....  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu bahiddhaa  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3702: [03] bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0447^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ --  bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m ajjhattassa  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  ^a^T2.0587^ea^ paccayo. text.3703: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0523^ea^ ca bahiddhaa ca dhammaa ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m cakkhaayatana~nca ajjhattassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m kaayaayatana~nca ajjhattassa  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ca...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca  ajjhatta.m vatthu ca ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.3704: [03] ajjhatto ca bahiddhaa ca dhammaa bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayaayatana~nca bahiddhaa  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca...pe0...  ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca bahiddhaa khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.3706: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa ajjhattaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3707: [03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0588^ea^ -- pacchaajaataa bahiddhaa khandhaa purejaatassa  imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.3710: [03] bahiddhaa ^a^V2.0524^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa...pe0... (ajjhattasadisa.myeva).
text.3712: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ajjhattaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- ajjhattaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa  ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. text.3713: [03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  bahiddhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m bahiddhaa khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m  kammapaccayena paccayo. text.3715: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena   ^a^T2.0589^ea^ paccayo...pe0... (paripu.n.na.m, pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m).

text.3719: [03] bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0449^ea^ ^a^V2.0525^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo (pavattipa.tisandhi) bahiddhaa  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro bahiddhaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.3721: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatto  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca ajjhattassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3722: [03] ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammassa ^a^T2.0590^ea^ aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.3724: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, ajjhattikaa indriyaa (ruupajiivitindriyampi  vitthaaretabba.m)... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena  paccayo... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (maatikaapadaani  anumajjantena vitthaaretabbaani).
text.3725: [03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m  (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.3727: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- ajjhatto eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  khandhaa vatthussa ^a^V2.0526^ea^ ...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m (purejaatasadisa.m), vatthu ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  ajjhattaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa ^a^M2.0450^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatto  ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ ajjhattassa kaayassa...pe0... ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m...pe0....  (1)
text.3728: [03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0591^ea^ -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  paro ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana.m...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatto ^b^kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro^eb^ bahiddhaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3729: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m, indriya.m (bahiddhaa ninnaanaakara.na.m, maatikaapadaani vitthaaretabbaani). (1)
text.3730: [03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ ajjhattassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. text.3731: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m,  aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m kaayaayatana~nca ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ca...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m  vatthu ^a^T2.0592^ea^ ca ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aahaara.m^eb^ -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca ajjhattassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3732: [03] ajjhatto ^a^V2.0527^ea^ dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m,  aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m ^a^M2.0451^ea^ pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayaayatana~nca  bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca  bahiddhaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu  ca bahiddhaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aahaara.m^eb^ -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro  ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. text.3734: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo...  avigatapaccayena paccayo.
text.3737: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa dve, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare dve, samanantare  dve, sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye dve, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate cha, pacchaajaate aasevane  kamme vipaake dve, aahaare cha, indriye dve, jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte dve,  atthiyaa cha, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate ^a^T2.0593^ea^ cha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3740: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0528^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.3747: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T2.0594^ea^ cha, naaaramma.ne cha, naadhipatiyaa cha (sa.mkhitta.m, sabbattha cha kaatabbaa),  navippayutte cha, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa cha, novigate cha, noavigate cattaari  (eva.m ga.netabba.m)

(anulomasahajaatasadisa.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m) napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe ajjhattaaramma.na.m eka.m  khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

(2)

text.3901: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigha.m ^a^M2.0472^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati  nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa... kammapaccayaa...  vipaakapaccayaa... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa... sampayuttapaccayaa...  vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa... avigatapaccayaa.
text.3904: [03] 16^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ekaviisa, aaramma.ne eka.m, adhipatiyaa ekaviisa, anantare eka.m, samanantare  eka.m, sahajaate ekaviisa, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye ekaviisa, upanissaye eka.m, purejaate  eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme ekaviisa, vipaake aahaare ekaviisa, indriye ekaviisa,  jhaane ^a^T2.0620^ea^ magge ekaviisa, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte ekaviisa, atthiyaa ekaviisa, natthiyaa  eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3908: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigha.m ^a^V2.0552^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa, dve mahaabhuute pa.ticca eka.m  mahaabhuuta.m. anidassanasappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... rasaayatana.m.  baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m anidassanasappa.tigha.m  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa, dve mahaabhuute pa.ticca eka.m mahaabhuuta.m, mahaabhuute  pa.ticca...pe0....
text.3910: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigha.m ^a^M2.0473^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati  nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa anidassanaappa.tigha~nca  cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tigha.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa anidassanaappa.tigha~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca  vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa. aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca anidassanaappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca ^a^T2.0621^ea^ itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m aapodhaatu.m  pa.ticca anidassanaappa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate  khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

text.3919: [03] 22^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigha~nca anidassanaappa.tigha~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo  uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca sanidassanasappa.tigha.m  cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca  sanidassanasappa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m. anidassanasappa.tighe mahaabhuute ^a^T2.0623^ea^ ca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca  sanidassanasappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca  pa.ticca ruupaayatana.m. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m anidassanasappa.tighe  mahaabhuute ca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca sanidassanasappa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m.
text.3922: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa  (sahajaatasadisa.m)... naanantarapaccayaa... nasamanantarapaccayaa... naa~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- anidassanasappa.tighe  mahaabhuute pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigha.m ^a^M2.0475^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m.  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... rasaayatana.m... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m...  utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuute pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m.
text.3924: [03] naupanissayapaccayaa... napurejaatapaccayaa... napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa... nakammapaccayaa --  baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m  pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa, dve mahaabhuute pa.ticca eka.m mahaabhuuta.m. anidassanasappa.tighe mahaabhuute  pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigha.m upaadaaruupa.m (kamma.m vibhajitvaa nakammeneva ekaviisa  pa~nhaa ^a^V2.0555^ea^ kaatabbaa), navipaakapaccayaa (pa.tisandhipi ka.tattaapi natthi, pa~ncavokaareyeva  kaatabbaa), naaahaarapaccayaa ^a^T2.0624^ea^ -- baahira.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... (iminaa  kaara.nena vibhajitabbaa ekaviisaapi).
text.3926: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayaa --  baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0...  asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuute pa.ticca ruupajiivitindriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m, sabbe pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa)...  najhaanapaccayaa -- baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m  mahaabhuuta.m (sa.mkhitta.m, sattapi pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa).
text.3927: [03] anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa --  pa~ncavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... baahira.m...  aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca anidassanaappa.tigha.m  ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m.

text.3930: [03] (eva.m sattapi pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa), namaggapaccayaa... (nahetusadisa.m kaatabba.m. paripu.n.na.m.  moho natthi). nasampayuttapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m)... nonatthipaccayaa...  novigatapaccayaa.
text.3933: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V2.0556^ea^ ekaviisa, naaaramma.ne ekaviisa, naadhipatiyaa ekaviisa   ^a^T2.0625^ea^ (sa.mkhitta.m, sabbattha ekaviisa), nonatthiyaa ekaviisa, novigate ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3937: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne ekaviisa, naadhipatiyaa ekaviisa...pe0... nakamme eka.m,  navipaake ekaviisa, nasampayutte ekaviisa, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa ekaviisa,  novigate ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3941: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m,   samanantare eka.m, sahajaate ekaviisa ^a^V2.0557^ea^ ...pe0...  jhaane ekaviisa, magge eka.m, sampayutte eka.m ^a^M2.0477^ea^, vippayutte ekaviisa,  atthiyaa ekaviisa, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.3945: [03] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa, sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi  aruupeyeva kaatabbaa.)
text.3949: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --  anidassanaappa.tighaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T2.0626^ea^ paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3950: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  hetuu sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (2)
text.3953: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  ruupe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m  uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. sanidassanasappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3954: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaaya.m... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... anidassanasappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa   ^a^T2.0627^ea^, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3955: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani  paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m  paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa,  phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti...pe0...  vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m...  kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena anidassanaappa.tighacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0...  anidassanaappa.tighaa ^a^V2.0559^ea^ khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3957: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ruupa.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.3958: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho ^a^T2.0628^ea^ ^a^M2.0479^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe...  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  (1)
text.3959: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0...  nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m...  kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3960: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  anidassanaappa.tighaadhipati sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3963: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^T2.0629^ea^ ^a^V2.0560^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu  maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa...  nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3965: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^M2.0480^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena  paccayo (anantarasadisa.m).
text.3967: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m  saadhuka.m kaatabba.m. a~n~nama~n~napaccaye pa.ticcavaare a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m, nissayapaccaye pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m).
text.3969: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- va.n.nasampada.m  patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... va.n.nasampadaa  saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3970: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa ^a^T2.0630^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0561^ea^  -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano...pe0...  kaayasampada.m... saddasampada.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m  samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... utu.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti siila.m samaadiyati.  uposathakamma.m, jhaana.m... vipassana.m... magga.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti  paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. cakkhusampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa, utu,  senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa,  kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3971: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo --  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... jhaana.m... samaapatti.m  uppaadeti, maana.m ^a^M2.0481^ea^ jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m...  raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... bhojana.m upanissaaya  daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. saddhaa ...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa,  kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... bhojana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, maggassa,  phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3973: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0...  uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^T2.0631^ea^ ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3974: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde...pe0...  pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^V2.0562^ea^  paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3975: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu.m... itthindriya.m...  purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m...  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3976: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3977: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho ^a^M2.0482^ea^ ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa  dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^baaramma.napurejaata.m ^a^T2.0632^ea^, vatthupurejaata.mb^. cakkhaayatana~nca  vatthu ca...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3978: [03] sanidassanasappa.tigho ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3980: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo --  pacchaajaataa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3981: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0563^ea^ -- pacchaajaataa  anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3984: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa...  gotrabhu ^a^T2.0633^ea^ maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3986: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^M2.0483^ea^ ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m  khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3987: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa,  naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  cetanaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3988: [03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa sahajaataa naanaakkha.nikaa iminaa kaara.nena vibhajitabbaa, tividharuupasa"ngaho.)  (7)
text.3990: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^V2.0564^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo --  vipaako anidassanaappa.tigho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tigho  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena  paccayo...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa ^a^T2.0634^ea^ vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3991: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa  anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena  paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m  vipaakapaccayena paccayo. text.3994: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo --  anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m ^a^M2.0484^ea^ anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo.  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. text.3995: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  aahaaraa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena ^a^V2.0565^ea^ paccayo.  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3996: [03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa ^a^T2.0635^ea^ pavattipa.tisandhi vibhajitabbaa, sattasupi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro kaatabbo.)  (7)
text.3998: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3999: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena  paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca  ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. ruupajiivitindriya.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m  indriyapaccayena paccayo. text.4000: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  indriyaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo.  ruupajiivitindriya.m sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. text.4007: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa  khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ^a^T2.0637^ea^ khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.4008: [03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m  ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^   -- anidassanaappa.tighaa ^a^M2.0486^ea^ ^a^V2.0567^ea^  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. text.4012: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- anidassanasappa.tigha.m  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. anidassanasappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanasappa.tighaana.m   ^a^T2.0638^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m cakkhaayatanassa...pe0...  rasaayatanassa atthipaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m...  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. utusamu.t.thaanaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanasappa.tighaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. asa~n~nasattaana.m anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0.... (1)

text.4015: [03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanasappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ^a^V2.0568^ea^ ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (yaava asa~n~nasattaa vitthaaretabbaa).  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m, sadde...pe0... pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. text.4017: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa   ^a^T2.0639^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tigho  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... aapodhaatu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m...pe0... aapodhaatu itthindriyassa...pe0...  kaba.liikaaraahaarassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m...  asa~n~nasattaana.m aapodhaatu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m...  aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati,  vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro^eb^ imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^  anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (eva.m avasesaa cha pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa.  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriyampi kaatabbaa). text.4063: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M2.0492^ea^ pa~ncaviisa, naaaramma.ne dvaaviisa, naadhipatiyaa pa~ncaviisa, naanantare  pa~ncaviisa, nasamanantare pa~ncaviisa, nasahajaate dvaadasa, naa~n~nama~n~ne catuviisa, nanissaye nava,  naupanissaye pa~ncaviisa, napurejaate baaviisa, napacchaajaate pa~ncaviisa, naaasevane pa~ncaviisa,  nakamme pa~ncaviisa, navipaake catuviisa, naaahaare pa~ncaviisa, naindriye teviisa, najhaane  pa~ncaviisa, namagge pa~ncaviisa, nasampayutte catuviisa, navippayutte baaviisa, noatthiyaa   ^a^T2.0646^ea^ nava, nonatthiyaa pa~ncaviisa, novigate pa~ncaviisa, noavigate nava.
text.4067: [01] nahetupaccayaa naaaramma.napaccayaa naadhipatiyaa baaviisa, naanantare baaviisa, nasamanantare baaviisa,  nasahajaate nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne baaviisa, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye ekaviisa, napurejaate  baaviisa, napacchaajaate baaviisa...pe0... nasampayutte baaviisa, navippayutte baaviisa ^a^V2.0575^ea^, noatthiyaa  nava, nonatthiyaa baaviisa, novigate baaviisa, noavigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.4071: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta,  naa~n~nama~n~ne satta, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate satta...pe0...  nasampayutte satta, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta.
text.4073: [03] 65^b^.^eb^ hetu-sahajaata-nissaya-atthi-avigatanti ^a^M2.0493^ea^ naaaramma.ne satta...pe0...  naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naa~n~nama~n~ne satta (idhaapi sa.mkhitta.m), nasampayutte satta,  navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta.

text.4078: [03] 66^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0576^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m,  sahajaate ekaviisa, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye ekaviisa, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate cha,  pacchaajaate satta, aasevane eka.m, kamme satta, vipaake satta, aahaare satta, indriye  nava, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte a.t.tha, atthiyaa pa~ncaviisa, natthiyaa  eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~ncaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
